REST API

Comprehensive guides on RESTful API design, authentication, security, versioning, and best practices.

Topics

  1. REST API Fundamentals - HTTP methods, status codes, and REST principles
  2. API Design Principles - Resource modeling, naming conventions, and HATEOAS
  3. Authentication & Authorization - OAuth, JWT, API keys, and session management
  4. Security Best Practices - HTTPS, input validation, CORS, and CSRF protection
  5. Error Handling & Status Codes - Error formats, problem details, and HTTP codes
  6. Pagination, Filtering & Sorting - Query parameters and result optimization
  7. Versioning Strategies - URL, header, and content negotiation versioning
  8. Caching, ETags & Performance - HTTP caching, CDN, and optimization
  9. Idempotency & Concurrency Control - Idempotent operations and optimistic locking
  10. Documentation & OpenAPI - Swagger, OpenAPI spec, and API documentation
  11. Testing, Contracts & Automation - Unit, integration, and contract testing
  12. Rate Limiting, Throttling & Quotas - Rate limits, backoff strategies, and fair usage
  13. Observability & Monitoring - Logging, metrics, tracing, and health checks
  14. API Gateway Patterns - Gateway design, routing, and aggregation
  15. Webhooks & Callbacks - Event notifications and webhook security
  16. Async Operations - Long-running tasks, polling, and webhooks
  17. Deprecation & Lifecycle - API versioning, deprecation policies, and sunset headers
  18. Client SDKs & Integration - SDK design, client libraries, and integration patterns
